headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Newmont (NEM) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Newmont (NEM) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

raw.headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Newmont (NEM) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
raw.summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Newmont (NEM) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Western Copper and Gold Strengthens Board with Appointment of Mark E. Smith
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - November 14, 2025) - Western Copper and Gold Corporation (TSX: WRN) (NYSE American: WRN) ("Western" or the "Company") is pleased to announce the appointment of Mark E. Smith, P.E., P.Eng., to its Board of Directors (the "Board").Mr. Smith is a professional engineer with over 45 years of global mining experience. He co-founded and managed Vector Engineering for nearly 25 years, a consulting and engineering firm with a staff of 500 people and offices.

headline: Can Agnico Eagle Keep Its Shine Amid Rising Production Costs?
summary: AEM shines with upbeat earnings, but rising unit costs and inflation pressure could test its margin discipline in 2025.

headline: Why Newmont (NEM) Is Up 8.7% After Gold Surges Amid Dollar Weakness and Shutdown Fears
summary: Recently, Newmont Mining Corporation saw renewed interest as gold prices surged following a weaker dollar and concerns over a possible U.S. government shutdown, attracting attention to gold producers. This event underscores the substantial influence of global macroeconomic factors, such as currency movements and political uncertainty, on gold market dynamics and mining equities like Newmont. We'll now explore how these shifting macroeconomic conditions, especially gold's sharp price...
